numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Many players of color are in these leagues.
2. The percentage of head coaches of color is significantly lower than the percentage of players of color.
3. I wonder if this difference comes from a difference in time span between players and coaches.
4. The time span of players and the time span of coaches are different.
5. Players in these leagues play for fewer years than coaches coach.
6. Playing takes a large toll on a player's body.
7. Coaching takes a smaller toll on a coach's body than playing takes on a player's body.
9. New Hampshire is not very diverse.
10. This situation impacts the judgment of people in my community.
11. This situation impacts how people in my community view sports.
12. Some teams have a few people of color.
13. Most people on these teams are white.
14. The headline is: Diversity is seen on the field but not on the sidelines.
